title: Study Run Metadata
description: General experimental metadata describing study design.

links.name: Study
links.label: Study Run Metadata references the Study that used the experimental design.

experiment_number.description: Number associated with a specific run of the experiment

experiment_type.description: General strategy used for differential analysis

analyte.description: Type of peptide or protein enrichment

fraction.description: Number of fractions in the experimental run

date.description: Date of the data acquired from the mass spectrometry instrument

condition.description: Biological condition (ex: disease state) of the cases(patients) from which the aliquots derived.

plex_or_folder_name.description: Name used to group the files generated in single experimental run

tmt_126.description: The sample tagged with this isobaric label reagent
